comments.comment: Oya duk wenna epa akki.. Mta oyage hagim hodta therenwa. Badim ekka api godak asarana wenwa.. Minisu hithane api me dwala mansin hadagena jiwath wenwa kiyla.. Apiwa mansika rogin vidiyta hithane.. Smhara than wala api gedra ayta thiyena adareta eyla kemthi kenek vidiyta hesirenwa eylage sathuta nisa eth e wele apita danene nikan sharirayak asse hira wela inwa kiyla. Eth kwda hri dawasaka apita danena vidiyta hithata nidahsk danena vidiyta ina hadaddi minisu apita kiyne malli nangi nethnm depethatama nethi ekek kiyla.. Eth e minisu danne ne api kochra asada eka pethkta aithi wela ipadenwa nm kiyla. Gedra ayta api kochra adareda. E badim ekka api godak asarana wenwa.. Mewa therenna me thathwaya eyalata ennma ona.. E wage api kemethi ne kuruth apita anukampa krnawath api kemthi apiwa samanya puthgalyek vidiyta dakinwata. Ada samaje godak minisu inwa ugath kiyla hithuwata.. Thamath yatata amude adina pirisak.. Eyla nisa godak minisunge jivitha apayak wenwa. Man kiyne api hemoma minisu..
